extendedInfo.description: If youâre interested in sharing your faith in Yâshua (Jesus) with Jewish people, this app is for you. reviews.title: EVIL
reviews.comment: Jews are disgusted by this app because it\'s specifically geared towards swaying US! It\'s not called witnessing to people, but to Jewish people. Leave us alone! Ask why the developers is interested in harassing us. Have your faith, stop trying to come after us!

reviews.title: Can we put an end to this misnomer, once and for all.
reviews.comment: I find the concept and name, \"Jews for Jesus\", the very definition of antithetical. They are, in fact and practice, Christians spreading the gospel, a completely laudable act. But an activity that isn\'t all that kosher under Mosaic law. Perhaps change the name to, \"Ex Jews for Jesus\", or at the very least, \"Christians\". Also, since Jesus was supposed to be Jewish, I am always perplexed by honoring the Sabbath a day late? How does one square this circle with the Ten Commandments?
reviews.author: Adam Glass

reviews.comment: bloody wankers.. leave us alone, we\'ve died for centuries because of your fake messiah Jesus. don\'t support this...
